title: Supply of IT Equipment for Regional Office
description: Request for proposal for the supply and delivery of high-performance laptops and rack servers for our new regional headquarters.

items.name: High Performance Laptop
items.specifications: Intel i7 or equivalent, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 14 inch screen

items.name: Rack Server
items.specifications: Dual Processor, 128GB RAM, 4TB Storage, 2U Form Factor
